pages.text: $(li)The Dunes is a dry biome composed mainly of Arid Sand and Red Sand.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Even being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation like Yuccas Trees, Aloe Vera plants and Cactus.

$(li)There are even animals that can withstand these harsh conditions, like the Roadrunner, Rattlesnake, Fly, Emu, Kangaroo and even the Tarantula Hawk.$(br)$(li)On the nights Hushes will be around the Dunes too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Dunes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
